name: message-list
title: List Thread Messages
description: Retrieve all messages from a conversation thread with pagination support. Use this to view conversation history, analyze message patterns, or get context for assistant responses. Essential for understanding conversation flow and debugging assistant behavior.

thread_id.description: The unique identifier of the thread to list messages from (format: "thread_abc123...").

limit.description: Maximum number of messages to return in one request (1-100, default: 20). Use smaller values for quick previews, larger for comprehensive history.

order.description: Sort order by creation date: "desc" for newest first (default), "asc" for oldest first (chronological order).

after.description: Pagination cursor - message ID to start listing after (format: "msg_abc123..."). Use for getting the next page of results.

before.description: Pagination cursor - message ID to end listing before (format: "msg_abc123..."). Use for getting the previous page of results.

run_id.description: Filter messages by specific run ID (format: "run_abc123..."). Shows only messages from that particular assistant run.

examples.title: Get recent messages
examples.description: Retrieve the latest messages from a conversation thread

examples.title: Get chronological conversation
examples.description: View the complete conversation in chronological order
